name: Indianapolis Zoo
description: Multiple machines near the dolphin dome, oceans, plains and gift shop—each with 4‑design sets featuring animal themes.

name: The Children's Museum of Indianapolis
description: 12‑design penny press near entrance, in the world’s largest children’s museum.

name: Indiana State Museum
description: 4‑design machine by the IMAX theatre & gift shop near parking garage exits.

name: Indianapolis Motor Speedway
description: Pressed‑penny machine inside the gift shop featuring racing-themed designs.

name: Indiana Dunes Visitor Center
description: 5‑design penny press inside the visitor center—beach, dunes, lighthouses, wildlife.

name: Indiana Beach (Monticello)
description: 4‑design machine at the amusement park, works as of June 2024.

name: Indiana Historical Society
description: 4‑design penny press inside the historical society building.
